examples.en: HB! Hope you have an amazing day.

definition.en: (medicine/biology) hemoglobin; the protein in red blood cells that carries oxygen.

examples.en: The lab report shows my Hb is a little low.
Hemoglobin (Hb) helps transport oxygen around the body.

definition.en: (publishing) hardback/hardcover (a book with a stiff cover).

examples.en: The HB edition costs more than the paperback.
I prefer HB books because they last longer.

summary.en: Abbreviation for hemoglobin, a key blood test value.

definition.en: An abbreviation for hemoglobin, the protein in red blood cells that carries oxygen; often used in lab results (e.g., â€œHb levelâ€).

examples.en: Your Hb is a little low, so the doctor may check for anemia.
The lab report shows Hb: 13.8 g/dL.

definition.en: In writing and speech, it can also be read as the letters â€œH-B.â€

examples.en: On the chart, Hb is written next to RBC and WBC.

summary.en: â€œHBâ€ is an abbreviation. Common meanings include hemoglobin, homework, â€œHappy birthday,â€ or â€œHow about â€¦?â€ depending on context.

definition.en: (spoken as letters) â€œHBâ€ is an abbreviation used in different contexts; the meaning depends on where you see it.

examples.en: What does â€œHBâ€ mean in this message?
In English class, â€œHBâ€ can have more than one meaning.

definition.en: hemoglobin (a protein in blood that carries oxygen)

examples.en: The doctor checked my HB level.
Low HB can cause tiredness.

definition.en: homework (informal abbreviation, common in school notes)

examples.en: Donâ€™t forget your HB for tomorrow.
I finished my HB after dinner.
HB! Hope you have a great day.
HB to you!

definition.en: How about â€¦? (very informal texting abbreviation)

examples.en: HB we meet at 6?
HB pizza for dinner?

summary.en: a casual abbreviation used to send birthday wishes

definition.en: a common texting abbreviation for â€œhappy birthday,â€ used in messages or social media.

examples.en: HBD! Hope you have an amazing day.
HBD, sisâ€”love you!
Posting a photo with â€œHBDâ€ is a quick way to wish someone well on their birthday.

definition.en: Abbreviation for â€œhigh blood pressure,â€ a medical condition where blood pressure in the arteries is consistently too high.

examples.en: My doctor said I have HBP and need to cut down on salt.
People with HBP should monitor their blood pressure regularly.

definition.en: Initialism used in medical notes or forms to refer to high blood pressure (often written in all caps).

examples.en: Past medical history: HBP, diabetes, and asthma.
The nurse asked if I had any history of HBP.

summary.en: Hydrogen bromide; its aqueous form is a strong acid.

definition.en: The chemical formula for hydrogen bromide; in water it refers to hydrobromic acid.

examples.en: HBr is hydrogen bromide, a strong acid when dissolved in water.
In the lab, we used HBr to convert an alcohol into an alkyl bromide.
The reaction produced HBr gas, so we worked in a fume hood.
